extendedInfo.description: The ultimate camera effects application, 30 free live camera effect filters, apply sketch, colour, mirror and distortion effects in real time with a live preview!â Custom filter creator: Combine effects with the editor in an order of your choice e.g. Sketch and then Wave, or Ripple, Invert then Edge detect. Chain up to 6 effects at once for 50 Million+ permutations!!â Load existing photoâ Not post-processed effects, real time effects applied to the camera feed!â A number of effects are animated, like water reflection, ripple, twist and wave effects!â Menu system shows live previews of 6 filters at once!Effects include:â One Colour - touch the screen to set the colour - takes photos just like our iconâ Sketchâ Thermal camera simulationâ Strong Lens / fisheye / bulgeâ Narrow focusâ Blurâ Embossâ Edge detectâ Wavey - animatedâ Water reflection - animatedâ Ripple - animatedâ Twist / twirl - animatedâ TV Pixels - animatedâ Pixelate / pixelated - animatedâ Mirrorsâ Colour filters, sepia, greyscaleâ Zoom if your camera supports itâ Multicamera support for those who have more than one camera and Android 2.3.3+â Saves photos to SD Card DCIM/LiveFX/EULA and privacy statement here (also available in app): http://eawapps.blogspot.com/2011/10/live-fx-end-user-license-agreement-and.html

reviews.title: Effects
reviews.comment: I like all of tha effects
reviews.author: Elizabeth Stevenson

reviews.title: BRILLIANT
reviews.comment: This is a WAY cool camera app.  It works excellent for me and is WORTH the money.  All filters are awesome.  You can even create your own effect.  With new update you can use pics from your gallery and apply the effects..this is outstanding!  To save your gallery pic w/the effect press the camera button.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: AWESOME
reviews.comment: I had to buy the full version to get rid of the adds, the effects are just awesome.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Save your money.
reviews.comment: Very poor. What\'s the sense of using reviewing a photo when this app doesn\'t even edit the photo. A waste of money.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: I love it!
reviews.comment: it was fun on my tablet, but the camera on my phone is better, making this a great app for me!
reviews.author: Misty Tanksley

reviews.title: Unable to install
reviews.comment: Though I have purchase this app but when I tried to install it I get the message that the package file is invalid. please help me out. I am really feeling bad after wasting my money for this app which is not working
reviews.author: sonu kashyap
